text: Only 43% of US adults think that #vaccine is top priority https://t.co/1XrMoVAY1z. Why are we lacking the unity we saw when @Captsully and 1200 first responders saved 155 lives in 2009? Have we forgotten the lessons of unity learned when millions of lives are at stake!? #COVID19 https://t.co/Y5ZYsz9XOU
